channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Grazer beats the behemoth that killed her cub to win Alaska’s Fat Bear Contest
item.description: We have a winner in Alaska’s Fat Bear Contest. Grazer won the popular vote Tuesday, defeating a bear named Chunk.

item.title: 2 plead not guilty to assaulting ex-NY governor. Defense says they aimed to defuse conflict
item.description: A defense lawyer says his client was just trying to break up a confrontation when he ended up getting charged with attacking former New York Gov.

item.title: News media don’t run elections. Why do they call the winners?
item.description: It’s up to governments to run and administer elections and maintain the official record of who won and by how much.
